CustomField.description: Auto-populated display name for the line item. Shows Subscription product/plan or Product name depending on Type.
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Subscription__c)), Subscription__r.Price_Plan__r.Product__r.Name & " - " & TEXT(Subscription__r.Price_Plan__r.Billing_Frequency__c) & " (" & TEXT(Period_Start__c) & " to " & TEXT(Period_End__c) & ")", IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Product__c)), Product__r.Name & " (" & TEXT(Type__c) & ")", "Custom Line Item" ) )
CustomField.label: Line Item Name
